# lbstproj

`lbstproj` provides tools to create, maintain, and use standardized R
projects for the L-Biostat group.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `lbstproj` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/L-Biostat/lbstproj) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("L-Biostat/lbstproj")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

``` r
library(lbstproj)
## basic example code
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`archive_report()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/archive_report.md)
  : Archive a rendered report

- [`create_chunk()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/create_chunk.md)
  : Create a quarto code chunk from the TOT

- [`create_programs()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/create_programs.md)
  : Create all R scripts listed in the table of tables (TOT)

- [`create_project()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/create_project.md)
  : Create a New Project

- [`create_report()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/create_report.md)
  : Create a quarto report based on the table of tables (TOT)

- [`create_figure()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/create_scripts.md)
  [`create_table()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/create_scripts.md)
  [`create_function()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/create_scripts.md)
  [`create_data()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/create_scripts.md)
  [`create_model()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/create_scripts.md)
  : Create a R script pre-filled with boilerplate code

- [`export_figure()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/export_figure.md)
  :

  Export a figure to `results/figures/`

- [`export_table()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/export_table.md)
  :

  Export a table to `results/tables/`

- [`get_info()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/get_info.md)
  : Get Information About an Item by ID

- [`import_tot()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/import_tot.md)
  : Import the Table of Tables (TOT)

- [`lbstproj-options`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/lbstproj-options.md)
  : Global options for the lbstproj package

- [`load_all_functions()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/load_func.md)
  [`load_function()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/load_func.md)
  :

  Load functions from the `R/functions` directory

- [`load_tot()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/load_tot.md)
  : Load the Table of Tables (TOT)

- [`proj_rel()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/proj_rel.md)
  : Project-relative path

- [`run_all()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/run_all.md)
  [`run_all_figures()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/run_all.md)
  [`run_all_tables()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/run_all.md)
  : Run All R Scripts

- [`run_report()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/run_report.md)
  : Render a Rmd/qmd report

- [`save_report()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/save_report.md)
  : Save a report file

- [`save_data()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/save_scripts.md)
  [`save_figure()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/save_scripts.md)
  [`save_table()`](https://l-biostat.github.io/lbstproj/reference/save_scripts.md)
  :

  Save analysis objects as `.rds`
